reviews.text: I Think Matlock is A Really nice place Because Of the Cable carts and Arcades but The Train station is Not Big Nuff because  Sometimes it's  Really busy to Derby.

Horrendous parking. No one there to advise if it's full due to visitors at the Heights of Abraham attraction nearby. Cars were coming in but were stuck inside due to lack of management. You could see parking personnel checking cars were displaying tickets but were not bothered to help sort out the traffic jam due to cars entering the parking space even though it was full. 

The authorities interested in making as much money from parking tickets but not interested in welfare of visitors.

There is a car park about 15 min walk away, recommend that to anyone going to Abraham heights instead of Matlock Bath rail station car park
Beautiful landscape. Great time out with family.

Be very careful parking here.  If you pay by Ringo which is an allowed parking payment they still issue you with parking fines on your vehicle which you cannot contest online fully as they will not allow you to attach proof and instead want you to post proof you paid.

Ruined an otherwise nice peak rail steam train ride
